3DGlassierTouch 

 **Enhance Your Device with Dynamic Coloring and More!

**
                    
                    3DGlassierTouch brings a touch of sophistication to your iOS device. This sleek and minimalist tweak offers a range of features to elevate your user experience:


                    
                    - **Dynamic Coloring**: 3DGlassierTouch adapts to your app icons and lock screen notification icons, adding vibrant and personalized colors to your interface.


                    
                    - **Enhanced Separators**: Customize your UI with both thin and bold separators. Tailor the look of your menus with options for separator thickness and width, adding extra flair to your device.


                    
                    - **Backgrounds & Borders**: Immerse yourself in a 3D glassier menu background. Add borders with adjustable thickness for a sleek, refined look.


                    
                    - **Label Coloring**: Fine-tune aesthetics with label coloring options. Colorize titles, subtitles, and notification labels to match your style.


                    
                    - **Dual Coloring Methods**: Choose between two exclusive coloring methods, Warm and Silky, to set the mood for your device's interface.


                    
                    - **Customizable Corners**: Play with corner radius settings to give your menus a unique shape. Every detail matters, and with 3DGlassierTouch, you have control.


                    
                    - **Separate Settings**: Customize settings independently for both the home screen and lock screen, ensuring a tailored experience for each interface.


                    
                    - **3D Cell Hiding**: Enjoy a clean and organized look by selectively hiding cells in 3D context menus for a minimalist vibe.


                    
                    - **Feedback Matters**: Your feedback shapes our future updates! While manual color selection isn't available yet, im listening to your suggestions.


                    
                    Get 3DGlassierTouch today for just $1.50 and add a splash of personality to your iPhone. Experience the magic of dynamic coloring and more!
